descriptionHtml:
This \"mod\" is a CHEAT \"MOD\"

This isn\'t really a mod, it\'s a batch file which contains many console commands to save you time.
To use it open the console using the tilde ( ~ ) key and then type in \"bat hackgame\" without the quotes.

To install it move the file to your skyrim directory NOT THE DATA FOLDER, THE DATA FOLDER SHOULD BE IN THE FOLDER YOU
PUT THIS IN.

It advances all skills to 100, leveling your character up to the maximum level and giving you perk POINTS.
It also Gives you 10,000 health, stamina, and magika, as well as a carry weight of 1,000,000,000.
Also, it gives you 10,000 of each of the basic crafting items.

Have fun.

Recommended:
Leveler\'s Tower by Williesea (This bat file is easier to level up your character with, but this mod will let you get
all vanilla perks instantly)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14152//?
author: Atukanuva
